title: Why black hair matters
itunes:title: Why black hair matters
itunes:subtitle: Emma Dabiri explains how the history of black hair reflects themes such as capitalism, slavery and colonialism. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Historian and broadcaster Emma Dabiri explains how the history of black hair reflects broad themes of capitalism, slavery, colonialism and more. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
